949430.name: Trials of Titan
949430.description:
Trials of Titan is a bullet-hell mmo. Fight with friends to defend the world from invading Titans! Start your hero path by selecting a unique class. Defeat enemies to learn and grow your character's strength. Search the world for unique equipment and items to help you along your journey!

Trials of Titan is free to play, but offer's in app purchases to customize your cosmetics and gain quality of life enhancements. In ToT, you'll find elements such as:

• Massively multiplayer online
• Boss fights and dungeoneering trials
• Extensive loot and unique items
• Player to player trading
• Tough and challenging fights
949430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
